name: All Power To Weapons
Lore: 'The TIE fighter''s energy management system allows its pilot to transfer all power from engines to weapons at a moment''s notice.',
Text: 'USED: If a battle was just initiated, each of your TIEs present is power +2 and immune to attrition for remainder of turn.LOST: Lose 1 Force to take up to three non-unique TIEs into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
